item.description:
Elevating Your Creative Voice with Canon Explorer of Light Parish Kohanim

Mark your calendars for this event on March 31st!

Parish Kohanim is featured this month in issue( March/April) of "Digital Photo Pro Magazine" see it here: http://tinyurl.com/yz...

In his presentation renowned commercial photographer Parish Kohanim will share his life-long experiences, philosophy and transcendence through the art of photography. He will address how to stay ahead in this competitive and changing economy. Parish gives inspiration and challenges each person to do their absolute best and continue
to grow in their art.

Parish Kohanim has worked commercially for many Fortune 500 Companies, IBM, Coca-Cola, and DeBeers just to name a few! Parish's work has appeared on the pages of Vogue Magazine, Harper's Bazzar, Forbes, Time, and Newsweek. Having an insatiable desire to explore and expand his artistic horizons, he still remains true to his approach to simplicity and to the visual dialogue that is intuitive and innate.

An evening you do not want to miss...

Costs:
CIPNE + ASMP Members: Free
Non-members: $10

Where: Lens Pro To Go, 152 Commonwealth Ave., Unit M-1, Concord, MA 01742 Please
see their web site for direction and parking information! There is a huge parking
lot in the back of the building.

When: Social hour at 6pm.
Program begins at 7pm.

Light refreshments included.

Pre-Registration for this event here: http://www.cipne.org...

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Elevating Your Creative Voice with Canon Explorer of Light Parish Kohanim
